title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 240 - Transportation Conformity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 240 - Transportation Conformity

State Regulations

Subpart 240-1 - TRANSPORTATION CONFORMITY GENERAL PROVISIONS (§ 240-1.1 to 240-1.2)

Subpart 240-2 - CONSULTATION (§ 240-2.1 to 240-2.11)

Subpart 240-3 - REGIONAL TRANSPORTATION-RELATED EMISSIONS AND ENFORCEABILITY (§ 240-3.1 to 240-3.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 240

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305; Federal

Clean Air Act, § 182

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
